actionConfiguration.body:
insert into 
ticket (retailer_id,
				ticket_status,
				priority,
				created_time,
				assigned_time,
				agent_id,
				issue_type,
				issues,
			 new_code,
				project,
			 created_by) 
VALUES({{retailer_code.selectedOptionValue}},
			 'ASSIGNED',
			 			 {{priority.selectedOptionValue}},
			 now()+'5 hours'::interval + '30 minutes'::interval ,
			 			 now()+'5 hours'::interval + '30 minutes'::interval ,
{{agent_pick.selectedOptionValue}},
			 {{issue_type.selectedOptionValues.toString()}},
			 {{issue_remark.text}},
			{{new_code.text}},
			 			 {{project_dd.selectedOptionValue}},
						 {{Input1.text}}
);
